data.text: I would advise against staying here due to the outdated rooms and lack of cleanliness. Renovation and thorough cleaning are much needed. Pillows, headboards, carpets, mattresses.. It was a very bad experience and I'm never repeating it again
data.title: Stay away

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valuable Guest,

Thank you for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor.

I sincerely regret to read that we could not live up to your expectations. Please be assured that your experience at Centro Barsha does not reflect the service that we usually provide.

Every hotel is defined by the quality of service that it provides to its guests. Our success is measured by how our guests evaluate our services and facilities, therefore be assured that the comments and suggestions we receive are taken seriously. Your willingness to share your recent experience is genuinely appreciated.

Best regards,

Timur Ilgaz
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Centro Barsha

data.text: The staff of the hotel is very rude specially their manager Naseem. He allots the rooms to all waiting customers as per his whims and fancies without factoring in their age, long travel etc. So the first experience gets killed here after we waited at reception for more than 4hrs!!! And once room is allotted you are supposed to carry your own luggage to your rooms. Hotel overall is decent, did not take any of their services so can't comment. We stayed here for 6 days and breakfast was included in our package which was quite repetitive and average actually. Plenty of choices in the same rate available in same area so won't recommend
data.title: Staff is rude and impolite

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valuable Guest,

Thank you for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor.

I sincerely regret to read that we could not live up to your expectations. Please be assured that your experience at Centro Barsha does not reflect the service that we usually provide.

Your valued comments will be discussed with my team members in order to come up with a permanent solution to those inconveniences for which we sincerely apologize.

Every hotel is defined by the quality of service that it provides to its guests. Our success is measured by how our guests evaluate our services and facilities, therefore be assured that the comments and suggestions we receive are taken seriously. Your willingness to share your recent experience is genuinely appreciated.

My team and I will do our best to prevent problems from recurring. Hence, I would like you to give us another chance by staying with us again during your next visit to this area.

We look forward to be of continued service and hope to welcome you back in the very near future.

Best regards,

Timur Ilgaz
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Centro Barsha

data.text:
I stayed here for 4 nights, my only issue is the WiFi is very slow.
The room was clean, warm and had comfortable bed. Walk in shower, the view was overlooking the centre of the hotel directly above the dining room, at least it partially hid the noise from the mosque directly across the road. 
The breakfast choice was huge and very tasty, the chef cooked fresh omelette or similar to order, ate one night in the restaurant, very nice and reasonably priced. 
Nice pool bar on top of the hotel. 
All of the staff were very friendly and welcoming, nice bar area to relax and enjoy.
Would I stay again?
100% yes
data.title: Nice hotel with friendly staff

data.text:
Big thanks to everyone working in the hotel,
 especially thanks to Asure and Balqis working at the reception. 
You really made my trip easy and comfortable
Location great close to everything especially restaurants & Emirates Mall
data.title: Great experience

Best regards,

data.text: Excellent hotel and professional staffs . Breakfast was delicious and staff was so friendly specially Thanks for Ms. Rina hostess, so kind and welcoming. Definitely I recommend this hotel and thank you very much for everyone who made our stay unforgettable.
data.title: Delicious breakfast and professional staffs
